profile:
When residents and businesses across Whitby and the surrounding areas need a thorough and prompt electrician, they turn to EverReady Electrical. As a locally owned and operated company, we take pride in providing our neighbours and fellow residents with the safe, high-quality electrical solutions they deserve. All of our professionals are fully licensed and insured for your protection and hand selected for their extensive experience and complete knowledge of electrical systems.

We use premium products on every job we take on because we believe top-notch electrical solutions start with quality materials. Alongside exceptional workmanship, we're known for our outstanding customer care, and we attribute this reputation to our unwavering commitment to do whatever it takes to please our clients. We're here to help when you need:

A general electrician
Electric panel installation
Exterior lighting
Appliance installation
At EverReady Electrical in Whitby, ON, we have electricians available 24 hours a day, seven days a week for emergencies and routine electrical services, and we can complete most of our work within the same day. Contact us today to reserve an appointment.
